verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: floats] [ARG1: a pardon for Muhammad Ali] , but the boxing great ’s conviction for draft evasion was overturned by the Supreme Court in 1971 .
Trump floats a pardon for Muhammad Ali , but the boxing great ’s conviction for draft evasion [V: was] overturned by the Supreme Court in 1971 .
